mapper.select: select * from tim_img where goods_num = #{goodsNum} order by seq_img
mapper.insert: insert into tim_img(seq_img, goods_num, img_url) values (seq_img.nextVal, #{goodsNum}, #{imgUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT seq_img, goods_num, img_url FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM ru, r.* FROM (SELECT * FROM tim_img WHERE goods_num = #{goodsNum} ORDER BY seq_img, goods_num ) r ) WHERE ru = 1
